title: Which college of IPU is good for mechanical engineering in Noida and Greater Noida side? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are looking for ip university b.tech colleges in g.noida …then a very few colleges are their , as ip have good no. Of colleges in delhi but some colleges are also in noida side as well like DTC ( delhi technical campus),noida and JIMS engineering management technical campus , greater noida Hope this will help :) Feel free for more query!

GGSIPU is a reputed university and obviously,it is better to take admission in GGSIPU than in any college in Noida and Greater Noida.Because some colleges in Greater noida does n't match the level of Btech course. In Greater Noida and Noida I think Jims engineering management technical campus college is good for taking admission in btech course because they have standards and the kind of professors who give good knowledge about practical as well as theory and most importantly ,the professors are really supportive and encouraging and all of them had done their Mtech from various prestigious colleges .
